title: Lions get the win in wild Week 2!
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the wild week 2 in the NFL especially that Lions win over the Commanders. Jalen gives you a first-hand breakdown of the game and tells us about his excitement for this Lions team. Is Jacoby now all in? Also, huge comeback wins for Kyler and Tua. It’s time to stop the hate and give these two young quarterbacks the recognition they deserve. Listen as the guys praise both quarterbacks for historic wins. Plus, Aces take down the Sun to win the 2022 WNBA Championship. Chelsea Gray, Aja Wilson, and Becky Hammon star in the final game. All that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
